paragraphs.body: The walrus yak is a chimerical ${link_0}. The head of the creature was found mounted on display in ${link_1}'s ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: The walrus yak is a chimerical creature. The head of the creature was found mounted on display in Wan Shi Tong's Library.

paragraphs.body: The walrus yak has the snout and tusks of a walrus mixed with the ears, spiraled horns, and long fur of a yak. The rest of its body has not been seen.
paragraphs.text: The walrus yak has the snout and tusks of a walrus mixed with the ears, spiraled horns, and long fur of a yak. The rest of its body has not been seen.

paragraphs.body: The creature itself is large enough that its head is comparable in size to that of a ${link_0}. No eyes were visible on the creature's head at a glance. The walrus yak's long fur was white, suggesting origins in an arctic environment.
paragraphs.text: The creature itself is large enough that its head is comparable in size to that of a spider cat. No eyes were visible on the creature's head at a glance. The walrus yak's long fur was white, suggesting origins in an arctic environment.

paragraphs.body: The walrus yak is a direct link between its two namesakes, the walrus and the yak. Its head displays the tusks, mouth, and nose of a walrus, and the horns and fur of the yak.
paragraphs.text: The walrus yak is a direct link between its two namesakes, the walrus and the yak. Its head displays the tusks, mouth, and nose of a walrus, and the horns and fur of the yak.

paragraphs.body: The fact that a walrus yak's head was present in Wan Shi Tong's Library stated that he was a very knowledgeable person who has visited a lot of places or has had a lot of visitors, which also shows why he hates humans, some who might have caused harm to his library.
paragraphs.text: The fact that a walrus yak's head was present in Wan Shi Tong's Library stated that he was a very knowledgeable person who has visited a lot of places or has had a lot of visitors, which also shows why he hates humans, some who might have caused harm to his library.

paragraphs.body: A similar looking mounted head was among the many curios on the ${link_0}. The head floated down the river after the ship fell off a ${link_1}. However, as opposed to the walrus yak, this animal had brown fur.
paragraphs.text: A similar looking mounted head was among the many curios on the pirate ship. The head floated down the river after the ship fell off a lagoon. However, as opposed to the walrus yak, this animal had brown fur.
